FESI.awtgui
Class AwtGuiFactory

java.lang.Object
  |
  +--FESI.gui.GuiFactory
        |
        +--FESI.awtgui.AwtGuiFactory
public class AwtGuiFactory
extends FESI.gui.GuiFactory

Factory class to create the GUI elements, used to achieve independence of GUI implementation at compile time.
